Set1.Line: ~b~Officer: ~w~Excuse me, you can't have that gun on you right now.
~b~Officer: ~w~I have reason to believe you might be intoxicated.
~b~Officer: ~w~I'm going to have to ask you to put the gun down and come with me.
Set1.Outcome: ~r~Subject: ~w~I'll put that gun down over my dead body!

Set2.Line: ~b~Officer: ~w~Excuse me, you can't have that gun on you right now.
~y~Subject: ~w~I'm not doing anything wrong, Officer. I have a right to protect myself.
~b~Officer: ~w~That doesn't mean you can carry a gun while intoxicated.
~y~Subject: ~w~I've had one, maybe two beers. I'm fine, Officer.
~b~Officer: ~w~Let's not make this difficult. Put the gun down and come with me.
Set2.Outcome: ~r~Subject: ~w~You can't take my gun away from me!
~r~Subject: ~w~I'm not going to jail for having a drink!
~y~Subject: ~w~Alright, but a lawsuit is coming your way after this!

Set3.Line: ~b~Officer: ~w~I need you to put that gun down, you're clearly drunk.
~y~Subject: ~w~Who said I’m drunk? I'm just walking home!
~b~Officer: ~w~You're stumbling home at best, and you're armed.
~y~Subject: ~w~I have my rights. The Second Amendment protects me!
~b~Officer: ~w~Not while you’re intoxicated. Please put the gun down.
Set3.Outcome: ~r~Subject: ~w~You’ll have to fight me for it!
~y~Subject: ~w~Alright, I’m putting it down. Don’t shoot!

Set4.Line: ~b~Officer: ~w~*whistles* Hey! You can’t carry that weapon while you're drunk!
~y~Subject: ~w~Fuck, no need to be so loud. Just leave me alone.
~b~Officer: ~w~Don't be difficult, put the gun down.
~y~Subject: ~w~I said leave me the fuck alone! I don't wanna talk to you, pig!
~b~Officer: ~w~Don't make this harder than it needs to be.
